text: "Novocaine for the Soul" is a 1996 debut song by American rock band Eels and is the leading single from their debut studio album Beautiful Freak. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom, number 7 in Scotland, number 76 in Canada, number 84 in Australia and number 90 in the Netherlands. It was used in the British television series The Grand. == Track listing == ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Eels (band) songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Indie rock songs Category:Songs about drugs
title: Novocaine for the Soul
